industry: Support Activities for Oil and Gas Operations
description: Founded in 1919, Halliburton is one of the world's largest providers of products and services to the energy industry. With more than 40,000 employees, representing 140 nationalities in more than 70 countries, the company helps its customers maximize value throughout the lifecycle of the reservoir - from locating hydrocarbons and managing geological data, to drilling and formation evaluation, well construction and completion, and optimizing production throughout the life of the asset.
sector: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
tags: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
